Fax: +1 412 268-5577 Research Interests Programming Languages, Logic and Type Theory, Logical Frameworks, Automated Deduction, Trustworthy Computing (see also recent drafts, publications, talks, students & co-authors) Projects Substructural Adjoint Types Mixed substructural programming and proof-theoretic compilation Courses 15-814 Types and Programming Languages Fall'25, 12 units, TuTh 12:30-1:50, WeH 8427 15-417/617/817 HOT Compilation Spring'25, 12 units, TuTh 12:30-1:50, PH A18C Recent Drafts, Talks, and Publications See also Publications (as of November 12, 2025), DBLP, Google Scholar Profile Substructural Parametriciy C. Lisbon, Portugal, June 21, 2023. Invited talk, Companion paper.
